title: % Tracts with Opioid Treatment Program (OTP) (30-min drive)
name: OtpTmDrP
description: Percent of tracts within a 30-minute drive time of an opioid treatment program.
source_long: U.S. Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration Treatment Locator, 2021
comments: This dataset includes all US states, Washington D.C., and Puerto Rico. It does not include the territories Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, Palau. Zip code and tract centroids are not population-weighted.
